extendedInfo.description: ARE YOU A HOTEL MOGUL? Buy, build, and manage MONOPOLYâs iconic hotels in this all-new MONOPOLY experience. Check into MONOPOLY Hotels â FREE on your smartphone and tablet!LET THE MONEY ROLL IN â ONE ROOM AT A TIME â AS YOUâ¦ â¢ Take control of MONOPOLYâs luxurious 5-star hotels and create your own hotel empireâ¢ Upgrade hotel rooms and attract V.I.P. guests like MR. POTATO HEADâ¢ Customize your hotel with fun attractions like cupcake shops, movie theaters, and bowling alleysâ¢ Expand your property empire with a Museum, Zoo, Aquarium, and more!Buy it, build it, and bank it â for FREE!CHECK IN EVERY DAY!With unlockable challenges and updates â like new properties, characters, holiday packs, and more â there are plenty of reasons to extend your stay.Pass GO and get building today!

reviews.title: Map1701
reviews.comment: Very fun and entertaining.  No problems downloading.  Stupendous of a job well done.
reviews.author: Marnie Pryor

reviews.title: They stole my money
reviews.comment: I ordered 2 money clips and never received them. There is a glitch in this game. I wouldn\'t be surprised if there were more than one. When you use your game money to build a guest room in the game may, you may have to use your game money twice. Don\'t download this game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ehhh
reviews.comment: I liked the game but after I played for a couple of days I lost all my work I thought if I bought the hotel\'s again it would show ne my rooms but no it doesn\'t uninstalling as we speak it was fun but not if u have to keep building a hotel.u already built
reviews.author: Jessica Taylor

reviews.title: Too hard to progress
reviews.comment: Takes too long to progress in the game, esp since after buying my fourth hotel the game took the money but did not save progress.
reviews.author: Kristin krem

reviews.title: Force closes repeatedly
reviews.comment: Worked to get all the hotels and now it won\'t even open at all.   For three weeks now I should say. This game blows. Dont buy gold, period.
reviews.author: glynn geyer

reviews.title: Support sucks
reviews.comment: The games is okay, might be better if android users could actually use the social feature. Don\'t buy gold, if you do, you might not get them applied to your game and it after putting in a ticket, it has been over two weeks and no response . I gave them all the screenshots and proof and I don\'t even get a \"We\'re working on it.\"
reviews.author: Cindy Gorman

reviews.comment: I like it. I just wish there were more options that didn\'t cost real money! I am playing slow because iwo t buy more gold. So slow progression without cash
reviews.author: karla martin

reviews.title: Androids can\'t add friends!!
reviews.comment: This game is cute an addicting, but I just installed it and already within min I\'m ready for a upgrade, I wanna add friends like iPhone users,  it\'s so hard to get free gold when you don\'t have the train station... I just reinstalled it an now I\'m going to uninstall it again, I just can\'t enjoy it, sorry for the second time this game gets one start.
reviews.author: Aireol Richardson

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Its a great game. Just started. Got a few of my friends to download it, and my gf too. Umm just one question, for my galaxy 2 theres no social botton or fb share. Can you help?
reviews.author: Ed Mon

reviews.title: Promlems
reviews.comment: Was great until I decided to load panel app to get free gold, Now it won\'t open. This went from plus 5 stars to minus 5 in about 5 seconds. This is an update to my original statement.  I uninstalled this app and reinstalled it, I got everything back. The get free gold feature just doesn\'t seem to work for me but I don\'t really care. This is a great game. Now if there were just some gold producing room in the android version this game would be perfect.
reviews.author: Monty Truth

reviews.title: Need to fix and give me my stuff back
reviews.comment: Took all my mom ey and gold and all the room I bolt I\'m levsl23 with nothing
reviews.author: Meghan Haviland

reviews.title: WAS great...but now...
reviews.comment: I have been playing for a couple months with no problems..but now EVERYTIME I open it, it shows the EA logo, and closes. I tried to restart my phone but it doesn\'t work. Please FIX!
reviews.author: Kevin Riselay

reviews.title: Sucks now
reviews.comment: Liked the game but updated it and now wount load or anything. It\'s been like that for a few days already . Also tales up a ton of space on my SD card and it still is a 100 and something mb. Please fix or I am uninstalling.
reviews.author: Heidi Barnes

reviews.title: Won\'t open!!!
reviews.comment: At first all of my hotels disappeared so I redid them,then I tried to get gold and now it won\'t open at all :\'( this game was so much fun but if it won\'t  open I may as well uninstall it
reviews.author: Katie Hathaway

reviews.title: Stop stealing from your customers
reviews.comment: Could be more fun and higher rating if didn\'t have to download every time I go into the app. Then when I win gold coins, don\'t always get credit for them. Why does almost everything have to be purchased with gold,
reviews.author: Jessica Jupiter

reviews.title: CRASHES
reviews.comment: one day I was playing with it them the next day went on to check my hotels and it said app not installed so I went to play store and it said installed
reviews.author: William Smith

reviews.title: Bsd form
reviews.comment: Same thing here.  bought gold and game just  froze on S4. Have they gotten back to me? No....
reviews.author: Brad Bournival

reviews.title: Deletes all of your rooms
reviews.comment: Just deleted all my rooms. Im still at the same level but now the game wants me to purchase all of my hotels again. This wouldnt be a problem if I didnt spend real money on gold. If you download don\'t spend you\'re hard earned money to just be ripped off. Update 8/5/13 it was hard to find a way to contact EA but after doing so I was refunded my money I spent on gold. Ive been playing since with no problems altough I wont buy gold until I know for sure it wont just delete it. THEY NEED TO UPDATE TO IPHONE VER
reviews.author: James Kirk

reviews.title: I have played better games than this!
reviews.comment: It works ok but can\'t say anything abt bc it doesn\'t look like u guys give a flying kite abt it . Bc ur not fixing previous complaints.
reviews.author: Autumn Mccroskey

reviews.title: Fed up with lack of updates
reviews.comment: This game is fun, but there\'s so many problems with the android version and i\'ve been patient for a few months and they Havnt fixed it , they Havnt even updated to the iPhone version yet. Good game but terrible maintenance and terrible updating, get your stuff together and I\'ll give 5 star.
reviews.author: Eric Engelsman
